title: Birth
description: Fran√ßois Hollande is born in Rouen, France.

title: Elected to Parliament
description: Hollande is elected to the French National Assembly for the first time.

title: Becomes First Secretary of the Socialist Party
description: Hollande becomes the First Secretary of the Socialist Party, a position he holds until 2008.

title: End of First Secretary Position
description: Hollande steps down as First Secretary of the Socialist Party.

title: Wins Socialist Party Presidential Primary
description: Hollande wins the Socialist Party presidential primary, becoming the party's candidate for the 2012 French presidential election.

title: Elected President of France
description: Hollande is elected President of France, defeating incumbent Nicolas Sarkozy.

title: Inauguration as President
description: Hollande is inaugurated as President of France.

title: Charlie Hebdo Attack
description: Under Hollande's presidency, France faces the Charlie Hebdo terrorist attack.

title: Paris Attacks
description: France is hit by a series of coordinated terrorist attacks, the deadliest on French soil since World War II.

title: End of Presidency
description: Hollande's term as President of France ends. He is succeeded by Emmanuel Macron.
